description: Lists the cross-account permissions associated with a signing profile.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the signing profile containing the cross-account permissions.

nested_items.name: revisionId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the current revision of profile permissions.

nested_items.name: policySizeBytes
nested_items.description: Total size of the policy associated with the Signing Profile in bytes.

nested_items.name: permissions
nested_items.description: List of permissions associated with the Signing Profile.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: An AWS Signer action permitted as part of cross-account permissions.

nested_items.name: principal
nested_items.description: The AWS principal that has been granted a cross-account permission.

nested_items.name: statementId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for a cross-account permission statement.

nested_items.name: profileVersion
nested_items.description: The signing profile version that a permission applies to.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: String for specifying the next set of paginated results.
